shortdesc.ph: Callback for music file playback progress.
Reports the playback progress of the music file.
Reports the playback progress of the music file.
Callback for music file playback progress.

section.p: After you call to play a music file, the SDK triggers this callback every second to report the current playback progress of the music file.
After you call the method to play a music file, the SDK triggers this callback every second to report the current playback progress.
After calling to play a music file, the SDK triggers this callback once every second to report the current playback progress.
After calling the method to play a music file, the SDK triggers this callback every second to report the current playback progress.

plentry.pd: The current playback progress of the music file in ms.
Current playback progress of the music file in ms.
The current playback progress of the music file, in ms.
The current playback progress of the music file, in ms.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
